import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {Modal, Button} from 'bootstrap'; function TaskItem(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (
{props.task.title} {props.task.state}

{props.task.body}

Modal heading Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal!
TASK TITLE
TASK COMMENT
) } export default TaskItem
